headline: Master the Art of Headlines: Join Ann Wylie for a Free Webinar to Boost Press Release Impact!
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 21, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WHAT: Webinar - How to Write a Press Release Headline That Works Struggling to make your press release headlines stand out? Join award-winning writing coach Ann Wylie, president of Wylie Communications, for an exclusive webinar packed with proven strategies to craft attention-grabbing headlines that captivate readers, resonate with your audience and boost your chances of media coverage. Plus, claim your free workbook to take your skills to the next lev
